title: Login Error
body: When ever I enter my password and click login it keeps saying that it does not receive a response from the server and it does that on 3 tries or something and then it just tells me that the login server did not respond?? any ideas friends?

replies.body:
I am having trouble also, but it uses the 3 attempts extremely fast (as if it is getting a response that it's not working immediately).

Obviously the login is %%%%ed, if my internet was I wouldn't have just playing WoW with 10 ping while watching YouTube and posting on forums.

Why don't they just say it's down or %%%%ed if that's the case?

Do you have a laggy connection? Seems trivial I know, but even people with a constant 30ms ping will experience this sometimes because of a slight drop in connection speed during the login phase. As far as I know, the login servers aren't as good as the in game servers, so any lag you have is maximised there.
